ISSUE.TITLE: What version am I running?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: There doesn't seem to be an indication anywhere that I am able to find that shows me exactly what version of Drone I'm running. I don't see anything in the web interface, the CLI doesn't seem to query or show this information nor am I able to find it in the database. I use `image: drone/drone:1` in my docker-compose file to make it easier for upgrades (`docker-compose pull`, `docker-compose up -d`), so I know I'm on the 1.x series, but I have no idea which version at a glance. I just did a `pull` and `up` this morning so I'm assuming I'm on 1.5 now, but I can't confirm. Please consider this a feature request to display the version of Drone somewhere - footer, CLI, etc. If there is a way to determine this that I'm missing, please let me know and I'll happily close this issue.
